Instruction: Add the green peas to the bowl and set aside. In a small bowl, combine the yogurt, curry powder, cumin, and salt; mix well. Pour the yogurt mixture over the vegetables in the bowl and stir to coat evenly.

Heat the olive oil and cumin seeds in a large skillet over medium-high heat until the cumin seeds swell and turn golden brown; add the onions to the oil and cook for about 3 minutes. Add the tomatoes and cook, stirring for another 3 minutes. Incorporate the cauliflower and potatoes into the mixture. Season with curry powder and salt. Continue to cook until thoroughly heated, about 3 to 5 minutes. Serve hot.
